front.title: SIP Extension for Model Context Protocol (MCP)

abstract.t: This document specifies a Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) extension to advertise support for, negotiate, and carry the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It defines: (1) a new SIP option-tag ("mcp"), (2) new header fields for capability advertisement and selection, (3) Contact feature-capability parameters for registration-time discovery, and (4) the "application/mcp+json" media type. MCP payloads can be exchanged during session establishment and mid-dialog using INVITE/200 (Offer/Answer), MESSAGE, and INFO.
